author: Nicole Blackmore
title: £60m: what Sky's customers have to pay to leave
text: Household bills £60m: what Sky's customers have to pay to leave Comment: Sky is being investigated by the watchdog for trying to prevent customers from cancelling – but, for now at least, Sky's tactics still bring in money, says Nicole Blackmore Sky forces customers to spend hours on the phone when trying to cancel. Photo: Alamy
